scripts.build: npm audit fix && npm run bundle && npm run save-settings-schemas-as-json && npm run format && npm run build-test-pages && npm run build-wikis
scripts.build-wikis: npm run build-configuration-wikis && npm run build-data-guidelines-wikis
scripts.format: npm run format-src && npm run format-bundle
scripts.update-wiki: git clone https://github.com/RhoInc/dashboard-charts.wiki && node ./scripts/update-wiki.js && cd dashboard-charts.wiki/ && git add -A && git commit -a -m 'rebuild wiki' && git push && cd .. && rm -rf dashboard-charts.wiki/
